derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (but rare before the 19th cent.): from French fictif, -ive or medieval Latin fictivus, from Latin fingere 'contrive, form'

auth_sentence.content: Living through those twenty-five years and then making a fictive world that had only pitfalls and misfortune would feel false.
